alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 3:38PM EDT until April 27 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/. * At 338 PM EDT/238 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Blountstown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quincy, Midway, Blountstown, Greensboro, Gretna, Bristol, Freemont, Rock Bluff, Littman, Juniper, Douglas City, Florence, Hosford, Jamieson, Clio, Santa Clara, Shady Rest, Estiffanulga, Quincy Airport and Lowry. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
